trans-unit.source: Consists of a collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription" /> objects to be used with catalogs of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> controls.
trans-unit.target: È costituita da un insieme di oggetti <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription" /> da utilizzare con i cataloghi dei controlli <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" />.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe non può essere ereditata.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection> class is created by the various <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls in their implementations of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart.GetAvailableWebPartDescriptions%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection> classe viene creata dai vari <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controlli nelle rispettive implementazioni del <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart.GetAvailableWebPartDescriptions%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: For each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control that is contained in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> control, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription> object is created.
trans-unit.target: Per ogni <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controllo contenuto in un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> (controllo), un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription> viene creato l'oggetto.

trans-unit.source: This object maintains basic information about a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, including its ID, its title, its description, and a path to an associated icon.
trans-unit.target: Questo oggetto mantiene le informazioni di base su un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controllo, inclusi il relativo ID, il titolo, descrizione e un percorso di un'icona associata.

trans-unit.source: The various <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls can use a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription> object to display a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control's information in the catalog, without having to create an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control itself.
trans-unit.target: I vari <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controlli è possono utilizzare un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription> oggetto per visualizzare un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> informazioni del controllo del catalogo, senza dover creare un'istanza del <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controllo stesso.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection> class is used internally by the Web Parts control set to maintain a collection of all the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription> objects used in a catalog.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection> classe viene utilizzata internamente dal controllo Web part impostato per mantenere una raccolta di tutti i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription> gli oggetti utilizzati in un catalogo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection> collection is used only when a page is in catalog display mode.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection> insieme viene utilizzato solo quando una pagina è in modalità di visualizzazione catalogo.

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> control is being rendered, it loops through the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection> collection, adding the information from each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription> object to the displayed catalog.
trans-unit.target: Quando un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controllo viene eseguito il rendering, eseguire un ciclo di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection> insieme, aggiungendo le informazioni di ogni <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription> oggetto al catalogo visualizzato.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an empty new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza vuota della classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: This overload of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection.%23ctor%2A> constructor can be used to create an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: Questo overload del metodo di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection.%23ctor%2A> costruttore può essere utilizzato per creare una raccolta vuota.

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ImportCatalogPart> control creates an empty <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection> object if the content of an imported description file is `null`.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ImportCatalogPart> controllo crea un oggetto vuoto <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection> se il contenuto di un file di descrizione importato è `null`.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription" /> objects that correspond to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> controls in a catalog.
trans-unit.target: Insieme di oggetti <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription" /> che corrisponde ai controlli <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> in un catalogo.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection" /> object by passing in an <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection" /> passando in un insieme <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> di oggetti <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection.%23ctor%28System.Collections.ICollection%29> constructor is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart.GetAvailableWebPartDescriptions%2A> method implementations within the various <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls to create a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription> objects.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection.%23ctor%28System.Collections.ICollection%29> costruttore viene utilizzato il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart.GetAvailableWebPartDescriptions%2A> implementazioni del metodo all'interno di diversi <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controlli per creare una raccolta di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="webPartDescriptions" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="webPartDescriptions" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: A member of <paramref name="webPartDescriptions" /> is <see langword="null" />
trans-unit.target: Un membro di <paramref name="webPartDescriptions" /> è <see langword="null" />

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: oppure

trans-unit.source: A member of <paramref name="webPartDescriptions" /> is not an object of type <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription" />
trans-unit.target: Un membro di <paramref name="webPartDescriptions" /> non è un oggetto di tipo <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription" />.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: oppure

trans-unit.source: A member of <paramref name="webPartDescriptions" /> has a duplicate <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription.ID" /> property
trans-unit.target: Un membro di <paramref name="webPartDescriptions" /> ha una proprietà <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription.ID" /> duplicata.

trans-unit.source: A particular <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription" />.
trans-unit.target: Controllo <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription" /> specifico.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether a particular control exists in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un valore che indica la presenza di un particolare controllo nell'insieme.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether a particular <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription" /> exists in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Valore Boolean che indica se in un insieme <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription" /> è incluso un controllo <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection" /> specifico.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection.Contains%2A> method enables you to determine whether a particular <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription> object is part of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection.Contains%2A> metodo consente di determinare se un particolare <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription> oggetto fa parte di un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection> insieme.

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription" /> objects to contain the copied collection.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di oggetti <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription" /> in cui è contenuto l'insieme copiato.

trans-unit.source: The starting point in the array at which to place the collection contents.
trans-unit.target: Punto di partenza nella matrice in corrispondenza del quale inserire il contenuto dell'insieme.

trans-unit.source: Copies the collection to an array of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Copia l'insieme in una matrice di oggetti <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection.CopyTo%2A> method is useful when you want to assemble a custom array that can contain the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription> objects in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection.CopyTo%2A> metodo è utile quando si desidera comporre una matrice di tipo personalizzata che può contenere il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription> gli oggetti di <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection> insieme.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription" /> that is a member of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription" /> che corrisponde a un membro dell'insieme.

trans-unit.source: Returns the position of a particular member of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce la posizione di un membro specifico dell'insieme.

trans-unit.source: An integer that indicates the position of a particular object in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Integer che indica la posizione di un oggetto specifico nell'insieme.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection.IndexOf%2A> method is useful if you have multiple <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription> objects, and you need to know the ordinal position of one object relative to the others.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection.IndexOf%2A> metodo è utile se si dispone di più <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription> oggetti ed è necessario conoscere la posizione ordinale di un oggetto rispetto agli altri.

trans-unit.source: Gets a specific member of the collection according to its index or a unique string identifier.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un membro specifico dell'insieme a seconda del relativo indice o di un identificatore di stringa univoco.

trans-unit.source: The index of a particular <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription" /> in a collection.
trans-unit.target: Indice di un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription" /> specifico in un insieme.

trans-unit.source: Gets a member of the collection based on its index within the collection.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un membro dell'insieme a seconda del relativo indice nell'insieme.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription" /> at the specified index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription" /> nell'indice specificato nell'insieme.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection.Item%2A> indexer allows you to access the underlying <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription> objects in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection> collection by index.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection.Item%2A> indicizzatore consente di accedere all'oggetto <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription> gli oggetti in un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection> insieme in base all'indice.

trans-unit.source: The string that serves as a unique identifier for a particular <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription" /> in a collection.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che funge da identificatore univoco per un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription" /> specifico in un insieme.

trans-unit.source: Gets a member of the collection based on a unique string identifier.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un membro dell'insieme in base a un identificatore di stringa univoco.

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription" /> in the collection whose ID equals the value of <paramref name="id" />.
trans-unit.target: Primo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription" /> nell'insieme il cui ID corrisponde al valore di <paramref name="id" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection.Item%2A> indexer enables you to access a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription> object in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection> collection according to a unique identifier.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection.Item%2A> indicizzatore consente di accedere a un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription> dell'oggetto un <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection> insieme in base a un identificatore univoco.
